meta.short-description: Data generator for long running bulk indexing benchmarks
meta.description: This track generates data based on a selected subset of traffic to the elastic.co website, which has been anonymized and post-processed.

#COMMENT: 'operations' just define all possible operations but this is not the actual execution schedule. The execution is defined in the 'challenges' block and it just refers to the defined operations. The intention between this separation is to allow reuse of operations

challenges.name: append-no-conflicts-varying-bulk-size
challenges.description: Indexes using 8 clients and runs 4 different batchsizes for 10 minutes each. IDs are autogenerated by Elasticsearcg, meaning there are no conflicts.

challenges.name: append-no-conflicts-index-only
challenges.description: Indexes using 8 threads during 30 minutes. IDs are autogenerated by Elasticsearcg, meaning there are no conflicts.
